snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo of Real Madrid and Lionel Messi of Barcelona dueled each other to an entertaining stalemate Sunday, each superstar scoring twice as host Barcelona tied Real Madrid.
abstract: Barcelona ties Real Madrid, 2-2, in the Spanish league; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo of Real Madrid and Lionel Messi of Barcelona dueled each other to an entertaining stalemate Sunday, each superstar scoring twice as host Barcelona tied Real Madrid.

headline.seo: Messi and Ronaldo Trade Blows in Clasico Draw
headline.main: Messi and Ronaldo Trade Blows in Clasico Draw
